column4: I think in 11.10 the choice will be unity 3d or unity 2d you should campaign for classic to be available
I prefer Gnome, as do many other users... all I am "asking for" is for a setup choice between Unity and Gnome(hopefully 3)
i know there are ways to put gnome back as default... but if you could choose what to use would be the cherry on top of the cake
what I am saying is there will be no classic in 11.10 so no choice
